### **House members, by party**

```{r, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Required packages

if (!require("tidyverse"))
  install.packages("tidyverse")
if (!require("plotly"))
  install.packages("plotly")
if (!require("DataEditR"))
  install.packages("DataEditR")

library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(DataEditR)

# Read data

House <- read.csv("House.csv")
House <- data_edit(House)
write.csv(House,"House.csv", row.names = FALSE)

# Totaling members by party

Dem <- sum(House$Dem)
Rep <- sum(House$Rep)
Unallocated <- sum(House$Unallocated)

Party <- c("Dem", "Rep", "Unallocated")
Members <- c(Dem, Rep, Unallocated)
ChartData <- data.frame(Party, Members)

# Making the plot

fig <- plot_ly(
  ChartData,
  x = ~ Party,
  y = ~ Members,
  marker = list(color = c("384B70", "B8001F", "gray")),
  type = "bar")%>% 
  add_annotations(
    visible = "legendonly",
    x = ~ Party,
    y = ~ (Members + 20),
    text = ~ Members,
    showarrow = FALSE,
    textfont = list(size = 50))

# Showing the plot

fig
```

